DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , randomized clinical trial compare blood product use bleed event endoscopic neurosurgical procedure patient cirrhosis coagulopathy : Rotational Thromboelastometry ( ROTEM ) vs. conventional therapy ( SCARLET ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Blood Product Use Bleeding Events During After Endoscopic Neurosurgical Procedures Patients With Cirrhosis Coagulopathy : Rotational Thromboelastometry Versus Conventional Therapy
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 old , admitted hospital Patients clinically documented cirrhosis Patients coagulopathic ( INR > 1.5 and/or platelet < 50,000 ) Patients undergo endoscopic procedure neurosurgical procedure Patients must pregnant Patients must take anticoagulant antiplatelet medication ( exception ASA 81 mg heparin DVT prophylaxis ) Patients must active infection ( per PI discretion ) Patients must know hemostatic disorder
